nodes.text: Attempt to steal from a Nightbrother village

A skirmish took place in a Nightbrother warehouse in a Nightbrother village. The robbery was planned by Arzo Suun, a run-away Nightbrother, as an effort gain medical supplies, basic technology, and long-range comms system for his former village leader Mak Eak. Inside the building, Mak Eak met with fellow Nightbrother Ruul. While stealing the supplies, they were caught by the Nightsister Nelsel when she sensed their presence through the Force.
